Setting Device Properties

Assign a name and a domain name to your device to ensure that it is easily identified by other devices.

To set device properties:

 1. Choose Administration > Device Properties.

 2. In the Hostname field, enter a name to identify the device uniquely on your network. For example, RTR141.

 3. In the Domain Name field, enter the domain in which your device is located. For example, abcbusiness.com. If you do not know the name of your organization’s domain, contact your network administrator.

 4. Save your changes.
